title: Ticket #2855: WANT_HOLD doesn't work if WANT_VACATE is false
description:
The following configuration results in the job being evicted but not held: 

   WANT_VACATE = False
   WANT_HOLD = True
   PREEMPT = True

Related to this issue, I see that enforcement of MaxVacateTime is not done when putting jobs on hold.

I am planning to treat the fix for this as a change in behavior in 7.7.6 rather than a bug fix in 7.6.
